item.title: Kippo on the Raspberry Pi
item.description: I recently bought a Raspberry Pi and installed Arch Linux ARM on it. I came across a rather amusing blog post of someone using the honeypot Kippo and thought what fun. See hereÂ to watch elite hackers and their mad skillz. That's the great thing about Kippo - it records user sessions for playback. Anyways, this post basically walks through what I did to get Kippo and kippo-graph up and running on my RPi.
